mutants.mutated_line: ali_customers = [name for name in customers if 'ali' not in name.lower()]
mutants.code:
def find_customers(customers):
    ali_customers = [name for name in customers if 'ali' not in name.lower()]
    counts = [(name, name.lower().count('a')) for name in ali_customers]
    counts.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return [name for (name, _) in counts]

def find_customers(customers):
    ali_customers = [name for name in customers if 'ali' in name.lower()]
    counts = [(name, name.lower().count('a')) for name in ali_customers]
    counts.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)
    return [name for (name, _) in counts]

def find_customers(customers):
    ali_customers = [name for name in customers if 'ali' in name.lower()]
    counts = [(name, name.lower().count('a')) for name in ali_customers]
    counts.sort(key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return [name for (name, _) in counts]
